director.name: 罗伯·爱泼斯坦 Rob Epstein
杰弗里·弗里德曼 Jeffrey Friedman

this_title: Taylor Mac’s A 24-Decade History of Popular Music
introduction: New York's hottest club is Taylor Mac's 24-Decade History of Popular Music. This club has everything: countercultural history, off-the-wall interpretations of America's most recognizable tunes, ping pong warfare, giant inflatable penises making love and war to David Bowie's "Heroes," shameless gay melodrama, and of course, MacArthur Fellowship winner Taylor Mac.
chinese_title: Taylor Mac’s A 24-Decade History of Popular Music
